about_the_game:
Conquer the world as a brutal Mage

Embark on an underworld journey as a powerful mage in Infernal Hunt. Banished due to their unstoppable desire for destruction, he now finds himself trapped in the depths. With an unwavering thirst for chaos, his reign continues in this dark realm.

In this gripping action game, you step into the mage's shoes, navigating treacherous realms with a single goal: to unleash havoc upon all who cross your path. Face countless adversaries, utilizing devastating spells and ruthless combat skills.

Descend into the abyss, confronting vile creatures and unraveling the mysteries that bind you to this unholy domain. With each foe defeated, your power grows, bringing you closer to redemption and freedom from this infernal prison.

Prepare to embark on a harrowing journey, where survival depends on your relentless desire to annihilate.

short_description: Forge your path through the fiery realms of Infernal Hunt, a captivating roguelike action game. Prepare for an epic adventure where you'll confront hordes of otherworldly creatures and navigate treacherous landscapes. Are you ready to become a true hunter of the damned?
